SPEED CONSUMPTION:

BALLAST: ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 21.00 MTS VLSFO AND 0.10 MT LSMGO

 

ECO SPEED (WOG):

LADEN: ABT 12.00 KTS ON ABT 16.50 MTS VLSFO AND 0.10 MT LSMGO

BALLAST: ABT 12.50 KTS ON ABT 16.50 MTS VLSFO AND 0.10 MT LSMGO

 

IN PORT:

WORKING: ABT 4.80 MTS VLSFO + ABT 0.10 MT LSMGO (24 HRS)

IDLE: ABT 2.60 MTS VLSFO + ABT 0.10 MT LSMGO (24 HRS)

 

ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTION ARE UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS, DEFINED AS MAX BEAUFORT FORCE 4

AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3, NO ADVERSE CURRENTS / NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, CLEAN BOTTOM

AND ALWAYS EXCL. VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT,

OTHERWISE SPEED/CONSUMPTION WARRENTY AS PER HEAD C/P.

HOLD VENTILATION: ELECTRICAL VENTILATION CO2 IN CARGOHOLDS: YES

A60 BULKHEAD: NO CEMENT HOLES: NO

*ALL DETAILS “ABOUT” AND WITHOUT GUARANTE

VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO BURN MGO WHEN MANEUVERING/NAVIGATING IN RESTRICTED, NARROW, SHALLOW WATERS,

PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
